# Environment Variables for GitHub Actions CI/CD

## Frontend Variables
NEXT_PUBLIC_API_URL=https://your-backend-url.hf.space

## Backend Variables
DATABASE_URL=postgresql://user:password@host:port/database
JWT_SECRET_KEY=your-jwt-secret-key
AUTH_SECRET=your-auth-secret
HF_ACCESS_TOKEN= # Add your Hugging Face access token in GitHub repository secrets
HF_SPACE_REPO_ID=username/space-name
